title: 9News Adelaide | Thursday December 4 | Full Episode
description: Brenton Ragless leads the Adelaide bulletin, which features shocking revelations as a relief teacher accused of serious child sex crimes is revealed to have worked at over 40 schools across South Australia, leaving parents demanding answers.   The city also received its hottest day since March, prompting a fire scare in the Barossa Valley.   In a shocking series of events, an elderly man was violently robbed at a Campbelltown ATM, followed by the robbery of a woman who tried to intervene.   Police are also on the hunt for a shooter who fired a bullet into a Para Hills home in what is believed to be a targeted attack.   Internationally, the government's stance on repatriating ISIS brides is under fire, and Australia announces $95 million in military assistance for Ukraine. title: 9News Sydney | Thursday December 4 | Full Episode
description: Peter Overton leads the Sydney bulletin, with widespread fury over a major traffic breakdown as the M4 WestConnex tunnel closed for repairs, trapping Sydney drivers for up to four hours and causing immense congestion across the city.   Further breaking news includes the arrest and murder charge of a man in Northern NSW following a fatal shooting that escalated from a minor argument over a truck, alongside serious allegations against former NRL player Josh McGuire, who is facing court on charges related to a child.   On the national security front, there is political backlash concerning the government's quiet repatriation of Australian women and children from Syrian ISIS camps.   The program also features an exclusive preview of the elaborate plans for Sydney's upcoming New Year's Eve 2026 fireworks, a review of the second Ashes Test at the Gabba, and a major appeal for information, with the reward increased to $500,000, in the 2005 Jordan Thompson cold case murder.    | Subscribe and ðŸ””: http://9Soci.al/KM6e50GjSK9 | Get more breaking news at 9News.com.au: http://9Soci.al/iyCO50GjSK6  CHAPTERS: 0:00 Opening Titles & Headlines 0:41 Sydney tunnel meltdown traps drivers for hours 3:08 Man charged with murder after deadly dispute 4:56 Former NRL player Josh McGuire charged 6:14 Two out-of-control bushfires burn across NSW 6:41 ISIS brides repatriation sparks political controversy 8:38 Six Chinese nationals breach WA border 9:06 Partner faces killer in Easter Show murder 10:56 South African neo-Nazi leaves Australia 11:15 US Secretary of War breaches security protocol 13:00 Thai hostage remains handed over by Hamas 13:21 Australia sends $95M military aid to Ukraine 15:17 E-bike rider hospitalised after Barrenjoey crash 15:31 Australia dominates second Ashes Test at Gabba 19:04 Work begins on controversial Glebe public housing 20:52 $500,000 reward in Jordan Thompson cold case 21:39 Christmas tree torched in Kempsey firebug attack 21:59 Best and brightest NYE fireworks preview  FOLLOW 9News Australia â–º Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/9News/ â–º Twitter: https://twitter.com/9NewsAUS â–º Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/9news/  Join 9News for the latest in news and events that affect you in your local city, as well as news from across Australia and the world.  #BREAKINGNEWS #9NEWS #AUSTRALIA
